data.comment: The match is underway at Etihad Stadium.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 3, Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Sadio Mane for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 12, Liverpool have been given a penalty...
Goal! Liverpool take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Mohamed Salah spot-kick..
In Manchester, Liverpool push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Man City.
Craig Pawson awards Liverpool a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Free kick in a good position for Man City!
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
In Manchester Liverpool attack through Jordan Henderson. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 21, Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Liverpool's half?
Craig Pawson signals a Man City throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 23, Man City have a goal kick.
Man City drive forward but Raheem Sterling is judged offside.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 25, Raheem Sterling gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man City.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, In Manchester Liverpool's Mohamed Salah is caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Gabriel Jesus.
In the minute 31, Kevin De Bruyne instrumental with a fine assist.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne misses with an attempt on goal.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Liverpool's Diogo Jota gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Craig Pawson signals a Man City throw-in in Liverpool's half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
An attacking Man City player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Man City were awarded a penalty ... Which Kevin De Bruyne failed to convert!
In the minute 42, Craig Pawson awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold gets in a shot on goal at Etihad Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Liverpool.
Liverpool are pushing forward but Trent Alexander-Arnold's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Etihad Stadium.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Man City.
In the minute 46, Liverpool's Joel Matip has been booked in Manchester.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Manchester.
In the minute 50, Liverpool push forward at Etihad Stadium and Mohamed Salah gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man City defence.
In Manchester Liverpool drive forward through Diogo Jota. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Throw-in for Liverpool at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Man City in the half of Liverpool.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gabriel Jesus (Man City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Roberto Firmino for Liverpool gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
In the minute 57, Man City's Kevin De Bruyne breaks free at Etihad Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Etihad Stadium.
Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Man City.
In Manchester, Diogo Jota of Liverpool is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Liverpool make their first substitution with Xherdan Shaqiri replacing Roberto Firmino.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Raheem Sterling for Man City has been booked by Craig Pawson and receives a first yellow card.
The home team replace Ferran Torres with Bernardo Silva.
In the minute 62, Attention is being given to Liverpool’s Trent Alexander-Arnold and play has been suspended briefly.
It seems as if Trent Alexander-Arnold is unable to continue. James Milner replaces him for the away team.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 65, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Liverpool at Etihad Stadium.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
In the minute 70, Liverpool to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
Throw-in Man City.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
In the minute 72, Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Liverpool.
Important block from the Liverpool defence as Kevin De Bruyne fires in a strike for Man City.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Man City.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick Liverpool.
Aymeric Laporte (Man City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Man City have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne has run offside.
In the minute 86, Craig Pawson blows against Liverpool's Sadio Mane for offside.
Craig Pawson awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Craig Pawson will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Mohamed Salah for Liverpool is whistled offside.
Free kick for Man City in the half of Liverpool.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Liverpool.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Kyle Walker (Man City) gets a yellow card.
